tool_description: Get publicly accessible information from Alibaba.com using our Scraper API. Get information such as Normal Search Results, Store Search Results, Product Information, and URL Extraction.
name: Alibaba
title: Alibaba

api_list.name: Search Results By URL
api_list.description:
Extract Search Results from a URL.
This endpoint is used for when you need highly custom filters.

required_parameters.name: url
required_parameters.description:
Search Results URL.
This endpoint is used for when you need highly custom filters.

api_list.name: Extract URL
Search By Keyword
api_list.description: Get Search Results using a Keyword.

api_list.name: Get Product By ID
api_list.description: Get Product Information using Product ID

api_list.name: Get Product By URL
api_list.description: Extract Product Details using a URL.

api_list.name: Search Store By Keyword
api_list.description: Get Store Search Results using Keyword.

required_parameters.name: storeID
required_parameters.description:
Store's ID, for example:
https://**workers**.en.alibaba.com/
**workers** is the **storeID**.

api_list.name: Search Store By URL
api_list.description:
Extract Store Search Results using URL.
This endpoint is used for when you need highly custom filters.

required_parameters.name: url
required_parameters.description:
Store Search Results URL
This endpoint is used for when you need highly custom filters.
